long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The PriceBay extension is a free and user-friendly tool that helps Amazon shoppers make informed purchasing decisions by tracking the price history of products over time. With historical pricing information for over 3 billion products and support for 13 Amazon locales, you can easily see how the price of a product has changed over time and decide whether to make a purchase or wait for a better deal. Simply install the extension, visit the product page on Amazon, and scroll down to view the PriceBay chart.

Features:
1. Historical pricing information for over 3 billion products.
2. Supports the following 13 Amazon locales (geographies)
.com, .co.uk, .de, .fr, .it, .ca, .com.mx, .es, .co.jp, .in, .com.br, .nl, .com.au.
3. Simple and user friendly charts.
4. No account or payment needed. The PriceBay extension is completely free to use.

How to use:
1. Install the PriceBay extension in your browser.
2. Visit a product page of an item you are interested in on Amazon.
3. Scroll down to the bottom of the product description and view the PriceBay chart.

The chart displays the price history of the product over time, helping you make an informed purchasing decision.
